DOC.brief_summary: Post-operative analgesia efficacy use ultrasound-guided transmuscular quadratus lumborum block versus ultrasound-guided quadratus lumborum type II block
DOC.brief_title: Post-operative Analgesia Efficacy Using Ultrasound-guided Transmuscular Quadratus Lumborum Block Versus Ultrasound-guided Quadratus Lumborum Type II Block .
DOC.detailed_description: The Quadratus Lumborum ( QL ) Block ultrasound-guided technique describe Rafael Blanco 2007 . The nerve low abdominal wall anesthetize inject local anesthetic quadratus lumborum muscle latissimus dorsi muscle , call quadratus lumborum type II block . 〝 Transmuscular quadratus lumborum block demonstrate injectate spread posterior abdominal wall psoas major muscle include upper branch lumbar plexus.〞described Adhikary 2016 . However publish report compare 2 technique . In study , compare ultrasound-guided QL2-blocks transmuscular quadratus lumborum block investigate analgesic consumption , pain level , opioid related side effect mobilization .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists classification ( ASA ) 1~3 adequate communication skill Body mass index < 32 chronic pain neurological illness/ neuropathy contraindication local anesthetic
